data.oai_dc:dc: Stable isotopic methane (dD(CH4)) records of ice core EDC

DEPTH, ice/snow, Determined according to Bock et al. (2014), Dome C, Dome C, Antarctica, EDC, EPICA Dome C, Gas age, Gravitational settling, ICEDRILL, Ice drill, see Bock et al. (2017), δ Deuterium, methane, δ Deuterium, methane, standard deviation
